S

Segment - Class in model.traffic
The segment class represents a line between two coordinates, or a segment in a route defined by a set of coordinates.
Segment(Coord, Coord) - Constructor for class model.traffic.Segment
Succint constructor, using default speed and length values: normal and current speed = 1 lenght = 1
Segment(int, int, Coord, Coord) - Constructor for class model.traffic.Segment
Full constructor, sets current speed to normal speed
segmentify(String) - Method in class control.Simulator
takes the rorouted route ni string format and turns in into an array of segments
segPos - Variable in class model.cargo.Truck
Segment position in the segment array
sendAnyTruck() - Method in class control.Responder
routes a random trip and sends it
sendTripRandom() - Method in class control.Simulator
sends a trip at random
sendTruck(int) - Method in class control.Responder
finds a trip in the trip pool and starts it on its route, according tothe given id

SimControlTerminal - Class in ui
This is the console terminal application that runs the simulator, it allows the user to run the simulator, send trips and check the output.
SimControlTerminal() - Constructor for class ui.SimControlTerminal
Simple constructor, creates a new Simulator
SimControlTerminal(int) - Constructor for class ui.SimControlTerminal
The same as the previous one, but sets the args to the value, basically this construction is used whenever there are options to the simulator.s
Simulator - Class in control
The heart and soul of the simulator, the main class used to instantiate and manage a Simulator instance.
Simulator() - Constructor for class control.Simulator
Instantiates a new Simulator with no options
slow() - Method in class model.cargo.Truck
